subject: Re: [junit] fundamental questions on JUnit
msgSnippet: ... I dont think it can replace your print statements because when you are printing, you are  discovering  rather than  verifying . ===== for
messageBody:
> > 3) Can JUnit ever replace stepping thru with a
> debugger?
>
> My question is can it ever replace all my print
> statements?
>
>
I dont think it can replace your print statements
because when you are printing, you are <b> discovering
</b> rather than <b> verifying </b>.

=====
